settings.heading: STIMULATING AWARENESS OF SUSTAINABLE FASHION AND THOUGHT

settings.title: Sign up for free
settings.text: Do you want to be kept up to date about new items and apparel? Let's make it happen.
Stimulating awareness of sustainable fashion and thought. Challenging street styles with extravagant, durable items. Making you look good (and cute x). Like no other.

Newsletter

Be the first to look at our upcoming collections and offerings.

settings.heading: Sustainable
settings.rich_text: We want you to Notice the world and its importance. Notice Fashion focusses on providing sustainable fashion to you. Be smart with what you wear. All Notice Fashion is eco consciously selected and produced.

settings.heading: STREETSTYLE INSPIRED
settings.rich_text: Street and urban styled fashion. Dress yourself in color while enjoying the comfort of soft and sustainable clothing.

settings.title: Under construction
settings.newsletter_form_heading: Let us keep you up to date about Notice

settings.heading: Organic cotton
settings.rich_text:
Organic cotton is a natural fiber which is rain-fed as opposed to using more damaging irrigation systems. Thus, using less water.

The production of organic cotton does not involve the use of chemicals, which is better for the environment. It does, however, utilize crop rotation to ensure healthier, more fertile soil. As well, waste from the process of separating the cotton fibers from the cotton seeds is recycled for the animal feed industry. 

Organic cotton is a responsible fabric that is softer than normal cotton and more soothing on the skin. You will Notice when you put it on.

settings.heading: Printing and packaging
settings.rich_text:
We try to be as eco conscious as possible with our printing and packaging materials 

Our environmental footprint is reduced by using socially responsible printing and procurement techniques, water-based ink and recycled paper.

settings.heading: Sustainable Fashion
settings.rich_text: Notice Fashion is not only about being Noticed, but about Noticing the world around us. We are constantly working to reduce our ecological footprint in as many ways as possible. Here you'll find things we do to reach our sustainability goals.

settings.heading: Vegan clothing
settings.rich_text:
All Notice Fashion products are ethically produced and made entirely of vegan materials, resulting in high-quality comfort. It also means that it’s not made of meat, but you probably figured that out.

No animal products are used in making the garments and no animals are harmed in the process.

settings.text: FREE SHIPPING ON ALL DUTCH ORDERS

settings.heading: Aware and awake
settings.rich_text:
Producing vegan and eco-conscious items is an essential part of Notice Fashion. All our sustainable fashion is made from carefully selected, often organic, fabrics.

We want you to Notice the world and its importance. It all starts with a sustainable frame of mind, which we are eager to impart onto you. Creating awareness for a prosperous and sustainable future.

With every collection we strive to be more sustainable than the collection before. We strive for continuity. Be conscious, be you, like no other.

settings.heading: About the brand
settings.rich_text:
Notice Fashion is a streetwear inspired fashion and lifestyle brand to make you stand out. Items with enticing colors, enhanced by complementary colored designs; made to be seen.

We like to challenge you to take risks, be bold. High-quality clothing to express your style and character.

The iconic 'O' in the Notice logo represents Originality and being One of a kind. It represents you. The complete picture. A timeless design on all our ready to wear items.

Be the best version of yourself while enjoying comfortable and stylish fashion.
